alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:37AM CST until February 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big River at Byrnesville. Meramec River near Sullivan. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big River at Byrnesville. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, South Byrnesville Road goes under water near this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CST Saturday was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 5.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Big River Byrnesvill 16.0 20.2 Sat 7 am 14.3 8.9 7.0 6.1 5.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
